name: Simple Serebii
description: Greatly improves readability of news posts on serebii.net, by changing the layout, increasing the font size, vastly decreasing the line width, and hiding irrelevant or redundant information. News archive is supported from 2011 onward, as well.
additional_info:
Styled with Open Sans in mind. 1.1.0, November 10, 2017:
  • Improve application for new Serebii markup
1.0.2, August 9, 2017:
  • Apply when Serebii is accessed over HTTPS, as well
1.0.1, October 4, 2016:
  • Display post dates properly when Open Sans isn't installed
  • Add subtle border around pictures in posts
  • Display ads properly when they aren't blocked
